pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Guang3 bo1 Gong1 si1

definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
"house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: Markey was speaking on ABC's This Week program.
sentences.chinese: 马基是在美国广播公司的“本周”节目中说这番话的。

sentences.english: Leahy also appeared on ABC's This Week.
sentences.chinese: 莱希也在美国广播公司“本周”节目上接受采访。

sentences.english: He appeared on the ABC television broadcast This Week.
sentences.chinese: 迪恩这个星期在美国广播公司的节目中露面。

sentences.english: Hoekstra was interviewed on ABC's This Week.
sentences.chinese: 霍克斯特拉了美国广播公司的“本周”节目采访。

sentences.english: He remains frustrated by ABC's decision not to report the killing.
sentences.chinese: 他同样对美国广播公司决定不报道射杀事件感到泄气。

sentences.english: A year telecine that appears for ABC ABC place.
sentences.chinese: 本片为美国广播公司ABC所呈现之年度电视电影。

sentences.english: ABC's John Quinones at Manuel Uribe's bedside.
sentences.chinese: 美国广播公司记者在乌里韦的床前对他进行采访。

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Quan2 guo2 Guang3 bo1 Gong1 si1
Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Guang3 bo1 Gong1 si1
Mei3 guo2 You3 xian4 Xin1 wen2 Wang3
Ying1 guo2 Guang3 bo1 Gong1 si1

definition: Associated Press (AP)/abbr. for 美國聯合通訊社|美国联合通讯社[Mei3 guo2 Lian2 he2 Tong1 xun4 she4]
New York Times, abbr. for 紐約時報|纽约时报[Niu3 Yue1 Shi2 bao4]
